Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAppointmentController
    This for adding an appointment.
    AppointmentModifyController
    It used to modify appointment and the error labels check empty fields.
    CustomerAddController
    It is used to add customer to database and customer table.
    CustomerReport
    This is the customer report controller class.
    LoginController
    It is used to allow the user to log in application by checking the correct credentials.
    ModifyCustomerController
    It is used to modify the customer by saving the changes to database and table.
    Reports
    It reports class.
    ReportsSummaryController
    It is used to show the appointment report by contact and the appointment report by month and type.
